words.def: bowed stringed instrument that is the highest member of the violin family
any of a family of bowed stringed instruments that preceded the violin family
A short fibre left over from combing wool or spinning silk during the preparation of textile yarns. Sometimes it is referred to as 'Raw Silk', although this is somewhat of a misnomer.
a cut of meat taken from the side and back of an animal between the ribs and the rump
large gregarious predatory feline of Africa and India having a tawny coat with a shaggy mane in the male
a slippery or viscous liquid or liquefiable substance not miscible with water
United States sculptor and architect whose public works include the memorial to veterans of the Vietnam War in Washington (born in 1959)
a particle that is electrically charged (positive or negative)
a soft silver-white univalent element of the alkali metal group
A working-class punk rock  subgenre of the 1970s, sometimes associated with racism.
a unit of length equal to one twelfth of a foot
